name: Vietnamese Traditional Food Tour
description:
If you are so busy, you have a long schedule to visit many places. You just have a little time in Viet Nam within one or two days.You ask yourself: “ What will you do? “ “ Where can you go to enjoy your trip ”. PLEASE DON’T WORRY ABOUT THAT. Let we give you some interesting choices.  
As I said about myself, my friend and i are the local boys in Ho Chi Minh city so we know many interesting places and can introduce some cheap hotels. The tour is written just the symbol form for a consult, so it is an alternative tour, which depends on your hobby and financial conditions. Please feel free to contact and ask us. We will discuss for your best expected trip. You will feel deserve with the money you spend.
